Pre-Game Insights: The Lakers have gone 11-5 in home games.
The Hawks are 8-9 on the road.
Anthony Davis is averaging 26.1 points, 11.6 rebounds, 3.5 assists and two blocks for the Lakers.
Trae Young is averaging 22.3 points and 12 assists for the Hawks.

The Hawks average 45.8 rebounds per game led by Jalen Johnson averaging 10.2.
The Lakers are shooting 47.2% from the field this season, 0.1 percentage points lower than the 47.3% the Hawks allow to opponents.
The Hawks average 13.0 made 3-pointers per game this season, 0.4 fewer makes per game than the Lakers allow.
